CISS-VAE

ciss_vae.run_cissvae

run_cissvae(data, val_proportion=0.1, replacement_value=0.0, columns_ignore=None, print_dataset=True, clusters=None, n_clusters=None, cluster_selection_epsilon=0.25, seed=42, missingness_proportion_matrix=None, scale_features=False, hidden_dims=[150, 120, 60], latent_dim=15, layer_order_enc=['unshared', 'unshared', 'unshared'], layer_order_dec=['shared', 'shared', 'shared'], latent_shared=False, output_shared=False, batch_size=4000, return_model=True, epochs=500, initial_lr=0.01, decay_factor=0.999, beta=0.001, device=None, max_loops=100, patience=2, epochs_per_loop=None, initial_lr_refit=None, decay_factor_refit=None, beta_refit=None, verbose=False, return_silhouettes=False, return_history=False)[source]

End-to-end pipeline for Clustering-Informed Shared-Structure Variational Autoencoder (CISS-VAE).

Complete workflow that handles data preparation, optional clustering on missingness patterns, initial VAE training, and iterative imputation-refitting loops until convergence. Returns the final reconstructed dataset and optionally the trained model, clustering metrics, and training history.

Parameters:

  • data (pandas.DataFrame or numpy.ndarray or torch.Tensor) – Input data matrix with potential missing values

  • val_proportion (float, optional) – Fraction of non-missing entries per cluster to mask for validation, defaults to 0.1

  • replacement_value (float, optional) – Value used to fill masked validation entries during training, defaults to 0.0

  • columns_ignore (list[int or str], optional) – Column names/indices to exclude from validation masking, defaults to None

  • print_dataset (bool, optional) – Whether to print dataset summary information, defaults to True

  • clusters (array-like, optional) – Precomputed cluster labels per sample; if None, performs clustering, defaults to None

  • n_clusters (int, optional) – Number of clusters for KMeans; if None with clusters=None, uses HDBSCAN, defaults to None

  • cluster_selection_epsilon (float, optional) – HDBSCAN cluster selection threshold, defaults to 0.25

  • seed (int, optional) – Random seed for reproducibility, defaults to 42

  • missingness_proportion_matrix (pandas.DataFrame or numpy.ndarray, optional) – Missingness proportion matrix for biomarker clustering, defaults to None

  • scale_features (bool, optional) – Whether to scale features in proportion matrix clustering, defaults to False

  • hidden_dims (list[int], optional) – Sizes of hidden layers in encoder/decoder, defaults to [150, 120, 60]

  • latent_dim (int, optional) – Dimensionality of VAE latent space, defaults to 15

  • layer_order_enc (list[str], optional) – Shared/unshared specification for encoder layers, defaults to [“unshared”, “unshared”, “unshared”]

  • layer_order_dec (list[str], optional) – Shared/unshared specification for decoder layers, defaults to [“shared”, “shared”, “shared”]

  • latent_shared (bool, optional) – Whether latent layer weights are shared across clusters, defaults to False

  • output_shared (bool, optional) – Whether final output layer weights are shared across clusters, defaults to False

  • batch_size (int, optional) – Number of samples per training batch, defaults to 4000

  • return_model (bool, optional) – Whether to return the trained VAE model, defaults to True

  • epochs (int, optional) – Number of epochs for initial training phase, defaults to 500

  • initial_lr (float, optional) – Initial learning rate for optimizer, defaults to 0.01

  • decay_factor (float, optional) – Multiplicative factor for learning rate decay per epoch, defaults to 0.999

  • beta (float, optional) – Weight of KL-divergence term in VAE loss, defaults to 0.001

  • device (str or torch.device, optional) – Computation device (“cpu” or “cuda”); auto-selects if None, defaults to None

  • max_loops (int, optional) – Maximum number of imputation-refitting loops, defaults to 100

  • patience (int, optional) – Number of loops without improvement before early stopping, defaults to 2

  • epochs_per_loop (int, optional) – Epochs per refit loop; uses epochs if None, defaults to None

  • initial_lr_refit (float, optional) – Learning rate for refit loops; uses initial_lr if None, defaults to None

  • decay_factor_refit (float, optional) – LR decay for refit; uses decay_factor if None, defaults to None

  • beta_refit (float, optional) – KL weight for refit; uses beta if None, defaults to None

  • verbose (bool, optional) – Whether to print progress messages during training, defaults to False

  • return_silhouettes (bool, optional) – Whether to return clustering silhouette score, defaults to False

  • return_history (bool, optional) – Whether to return concatenated training history, defaults to False

Returns:

Returns imputed_dataset always; optionally returns model, silhouette score, and/or training history based on flags

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame or tuple containing combinations of (pandas.DataFrame, CISSVAE, float, pandas.DataFrame)
